1105750.name: Cymatically Muffed - Soundtrack
1105750.description:
Who knew the source of your power would be giant battery operated headphones? Get amped for your daily adventures with the Cymatically Muffed Soundtrack! You know what goes great with these tracks? An awesome top-down shooter with a coop campaign and PvP multiplayer for up to 16 people, be sure to check out the game!

Most tracks are loopable. We will add new tracks as they are added in-game.
